name: The Enemy is YOU
description:
This is a game made for the GMTK 2019 with theme "Only One"

You got only one enemy and it's yourself!

Movement:

  • A,D - Move
  • SPACE, W - JUMP

Hints:

  • Don't let the holograms hit you. The hologram follow you step by step, be smart, you can control your enemy!
  • Hit the platforms (with your head) to change their state (Regular, Freezer, Electricity, Jumper)
  • Activate all the Blue portals in the Laboratory to activate the Green portal to pass the level.

Team:

  • Game Design:
    • EugeneTel - https://github.com/EugeneTel
  • Programmers:
    • PanosTrak - https://github.com/PanosTrak
    • FireDust - https://github.com/FireDust01
